modName: Vampire Lord Full Perk Tree by Kole
summary: You got bored to be that small and no power vampire.Here's the solution.With this mod you can be most powerfull vampire that ever exist!
descriptionHtml:
This mod gives you the possibility to get all Vampire Lord perks.

Credits:Kole

Note:Requiers Dawnguard+Latest version
        Use it when in Vampire lord form it won't work if you're a human/khajit/argonian.

Compatibility:Doesn't work with the vampires from Race Mods or Werewolf/Vampire Lord Hybrid mods.
                     Choose wisley what you'll become.


Note:If you're a mage or necromancer/pyromancer/etc..Use Vampire Lord
       If you're a warrior or something else with physical power,use Werewolf
Another mod made by me:Werewolf fully perked:http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49670/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D49670%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D1316847&pUp=1
author: Kole
